caption.p: Trypan blue assay on Caco-2 monolayers infected with L. monocytogenes grown in presence of the C. sativa EO. (A) uninfected control; (B) monolayers infected with L. monocytogenes #80466 not incubated with the EO; (C) monolayers infected with L. monocytogenes #80466 grown in presence of 256 μg/mL of the EO (magnification: 100 ×; bar, 400 μm).
